snippet: CHICKERING--Henry T.,Jr. January 19, 1926 passed away February 7, 2016. He is survived by his daughter, Heidi Anne, son-in-law William Simons, MD and grandsons Hal and Devon. He was predeceased by his first wife, Dorothy and his sister, Carolyn. His ashes will be scattered in the ocean he so loved. 1/3
lead_paragraph: CHICKERING--Henry T.,Jr. January 19, 1926 passed away February 7, 2016. He is survived by his daughter, Heidi Anne, son-in-law William Simons, MD and grandsons Hal and Devon. He was predeceased by his first wife, Dorothy and his sister, Carolyn. His ashes will be scattered in the ocean he so loved. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  CHICKERING, HENRY T.
